005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.ArrayException;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.List;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024
025public final class ArrayGet {
026  @NonNull
027  public static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
028      .name("get")
029      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
030      .deterministic()
031      .contextIndependent()
032      .focusIndependent()
033      .argument(IArgument.builder()
034          .name("array")
035          .type(IArrayItem.class)
036          .one()
037          .build())
038      .argument(IArgument.builder()
039          .name("position")
040          .type(IIntegerItem.class)
041          .one()
042          .build())
043      .returnType(IItem.class)
044      .returnZeroOrOne()
045      .functionHandler(ArrayGet::execute)
046      .build();
047
048  private ArrayGet() {
049    // disable construction
050  }
051
052  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
053  @NonNull
054  private static ISequence<?> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
055      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
056      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
057      IItem focus) {
058    IArrayItem<?> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
059    IIntegerItem position = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
060
061    return get(array, position).asSequence();
062  }
063
064  /**
065   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
066   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-get">array:get</a>.
067   *
068   * @param <T>
069   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
070   * @param target
071   *          the array of Metapath items that is the target of retrieval
072   * @param positionItem
073   *          the integer position of the item to retrieve
074   * @return the retrieved item
075   * @throws ArrayException
076   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
077   */
078  @NonNull
079  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> T get(
080      @NonNull List<T> target,
081      @NonNull IIntegerItem positionItem) {
082    return get(target, positionItem.asInteger().intValue());
083  }
084
085  /**
086   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
087   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-get">array:get</a>.
088   *
089   * @param <T>
090   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
091   * @param target
092   *          the array of Metapath items that is the target of retrieval
093   * @param position
094   *          the integer position of the item to retrieve
095   * @return the retrieved item
096   * @throws ArrayException
097   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
098   */
099  @NonNull
100  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> T get(
101      @NonNull List<T> target,
102      int position) {
103    try {
104      return ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(target.get(position - 1));
105    } catch (IndexOutOfBoundsException ex) {
106      throw new ArrayException(
107          ArrayException.INDEX_OUT_OF_BOUNDS,
108          String.format("The index %d is outside the range of values for the array size '%d'.",
109              position,
110              target.size()),
111          ex);
112    }
113  }
114}
